DOC.brief_title: Stress Echocardiography Heart Computed Tomography ( CT ) Scan Emergency Department Patients With Chest Pain
DOC.criteria: Presentation Emergency Department chest pain Lowtointermediate risk coronary disease per DiamondForrester criterion Free know coronary artery disease Inability undergo stress echo coronary CT reason Contraindication intravenous iodinate contrast Dysrhythmia preclude EKG gate Heart rate great 60 contraindication beta blocker Administration beta blocker within last 12 hour Known severe cardiac valvular disease pulmonary hypertension Stress echocardiography , coronary CT catheterization within last 6 month
